name: Mule

trait.name: Beast of Burden
text: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
text: The mule has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Hooves
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

description: Source: Monster Manual p. 333, Curse of Strahd, Storm King's Thunder, Ghosts of Saltmarsh
